column2: "Hm... It really is hard to make up your mind when choosing skills."
"I mean, it's not that easy to reset them, so I end up overthinking it to the point of not being able to decide at all."
"That's why I haven't even learned any skills yet! What a waste, huh?"
"How about you? You're not sitting on an unused pile of Skill Points, are you?"

"Hey, how about you show me the whole skill learning process?
Aw, c'mon, please?"

"Skill Points are used to learn \"Class Skills,\" the unique skills for each Class.

Skill Points are gained by leveling up and through Client Orders."

"You'll need to go to the Class Counter to learn Class Skills.

The Class Counter is in the Gate Area, Central Hall."
